CustomField.formula: IF( Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='PM/PO',uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProgramOfficerUserIds__c+','+uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProjectManagerUserIds__c, IF( Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='Grantee', uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProjectTeamUserIds__c, IF( Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='GAM', uNI_Investment__r.uNI_GAM__c , IF( Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='GAM', uNI_Investment__r.uNI_GAM__c , IF( Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='PRC',uNI_PRCLeadMember__c +','+uNI_PRCIds__c , IF( AND(Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='PT',uNI_HasAllPTClearedSMTPackage__c), uNI_Investment__r.uNI_ProjectTeamUserIds__c, IF( Text(uNI_ThirdActionOwnerName__c)='SMT',uNI_SMTMemberIds__c , uNI_ThirdWaitingforActionByIds__c)))))))
CustomField.label: Third Waiting For Action By id Formula
